FuncDef: The display spatial-multicast vsi command displays the bandwidth based on which load balancing is performed for Layer 2 multicast flows of a specified VSI.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VSI name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

Specifies a multicast group address.
The value ranges from 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255, in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a multicast source address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation. It can be a Class A, Class B, or Class C address.

Examples: Group Address    Source Address    Bandwidth    Channel ID
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the bandwidth based on which load balancing is performed for Layer 2 multicast flows of a specified VSI, run the display spatial-multicast vsi command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
